targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM inquiries WHERE processed = TRUE
SELECT p.category as metric, COUNT(*) as value FROM predictions p JOIN inquiries i ON p.inquiry_id = i.id WHERE i.processed = TRUE GROUP BY p.category ORDER BY value DESC
SELECT p.sentiment as metric, COUNT(*) as value FROM predictions p JOIN inquiries i ON p.inquiry_id = i.id WHERE i.processed = TRUE GROUP BY p.sentiment ORDER BY value DESC
SELECT p.urgency as metric, COUNT(*) as value FROM predictions p JOIN inquiries i ON p.inquiry_id = i.id WHERE i.processed = TRUE GROUP BY p.urgency ORDER BY value DESC

SELECT p.category, p.sentiment, p.urgency, COUNT(*) as count FROM predictions p JOIN inquiries i ON p.inquiry_id = i.id WHERE i.processed = TRUE GROUP BY p.category, p.sentiment, p.urgency ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 20
